articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Copa America pulled from Argentina as Covid crisis puts tournament in jeopardy - Goal India
articles.description: Zinedine Zidane has accused Real Madrid president Florentino Perez of a lack of respect in his final season in charge, while claiming "I’m leaving because I feel the club no longer has the faith in me I need".

articles.author: Chanel Georgina
articles.title: Cancer symptoms: Six warning signs on your feet that may indicate a growing skin tumour - Express
articles.description: SKIN cancer on the feet 'often spreads before it's noticed', warned the American Academy of Dermatology Association (AAD). This typically tends to be the most serious type of skin cancer too, known as melanoma.

articles.author: Jonathan Landrum Jr.
articles.title: Tulsa massacre documentaries offer deep dive into tragedy - CTV News
articles.description: Several documentary filmmakers -- some backed by NBA superstars -- are shedding light on the historically ignored Tulsa Race Massacre of 1921, one of the most horrific tragedies in American history.
articles.content:

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: How to photograph solar eclipse from North America and Europe this June - Digital Camera World
articles.description: A rare ‘ring of fire’ sunrise eclipse will be visible in America this June while Europeans will see a bite taken out of the Sun
articles.content: The northern hemisphere is about to get a solar eclipse. A rare celestial event where a New Moon slips precisely between the Earth and the Sun, what happens on 10 June, 2021 will look drastically dif… [+8447 chars]
